sources.title: Battle Scars | Full Vietnam War Drama Movie | 2020
sources.description:

Battle Scars - A War Veteran's PTSD drives him to a dark violent underworld he may never be able to escape from.

2020
Stars: Kit Lang, Arturo Castro, Illya Konstantin

metadata.Plot: After his best friend is drafted to fight in Vietnam, a young man must grapple with the reality of life before and after war.
metadata.Writer: Samuel Gonzalez Jr., Christopher Lang, Michael Kuper
metadata.Actors: Kit Lang, Arturo Castro, Illya Konstantin
